channel.title: Instant Freeze

item.title: Instant Freeze
item.dc:creator: @Siccc Siccc
item.description:
@Siccc wrote:

Hey, I’ve been trying to get my Ice Spells to freeze instantly. I’ve looked at basically all the threads about it and I’m still having no luck. My ifFreeze method is this.

public void ifFreeze(long delay) { lastEntangle = System.currentTimeMillis(); entangleDelay = delay; sM("You have been frozen!"); toX = absX; toY = absY; newWalkCmdSteps = 0; newWalkCmdX[0] = newWalkCmdY[0] = tmpNWCX[0] = tmpNWCY[0] = 0; getNextPlayerMovement(); }

I’ve tryed like all the other ones, I can’t seem to get any lucky. Thanks bunches!

Still no luck…

Read full topic
